sense.gloss: (East Asian) rainy season (in Japan, usu. from early June to mid-July)

sdata.j: |↑梅雨|↑↓つゆ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓りましたね。
sdata.e: The rainy season has set in.

sdata.j: |↑梅雨|↑↓つゆ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓ってしまったね。
sdata.e: The rainy season has set in.
The rainy season has set in.
The rainy season has set in.

sdata.j: もうすぐ|↑梅雨|入↑↓つゆい↓りだ。
sdata.e: The rainy season is near at hand.

sdata.j: もう↑２↑↓に↓↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓かそこらで|↑梅雨|↑↓つゆ↓も↑終↑↓お↓わるでしょう。
sdata.e: The rainy season will be over in another two weeks or so.

sdata.j: とうとう|↑梅雨|↑↓つゆ↓が↑終↑↓お↓わったようだ。
sdata.e: It seems that the rainy season is over at last.

sdata.j: ↑今年↑↓ことし↓は|↑梅雨|↑↓つゆ↓が↑早↑↓はや↓く↑始↑↓はじ↓まると↑思↑↓おも↓いますか。
sdata.e: Do you think the rainy season will set in early this year?

sdata.j: ↑今年↑↓ことし↓は|↑梅雨|↑↓つゆ↓↑明↑↓あ↓けが↑遅↑↓おそ↓かった。
sdata.e: The end of the rainy season came late this year.

sdata.j: ↑天気↑↓てんき↓↑予報↑↓よほう↓によれば、まもなく|↑梅雨|↑↓つゆ↓に↑入↑↓はい↓るそうだ。
sdata.e: According to the weather forecast, the rainy season will set in before long.
